title: Screw Jeep’s normie EV — I wanted an electrified Cherokee
content:
Jeep’s current eco-friendly vehicles are plug-in hybrids, but the American brand is now ready to take the next step towards electrification. Yes, folks, I present to you Jeep’s very first EV, the…  Okay, it doesn’t even have a name yet. But here it is:  Image: Stellantis Image: Stellantis If you don’t feel wowed, I feel you. It’s a slick-looking car, yet rather ordinary, and I expected something more from the automaker’s electric vehicle flagship.  And if you’re thinking “don’t judge a book by its cover,” let me stop you right there. Because we know absolutely nothing about what’s inside the…

This story continues at The Next Web
description: Jeep has revealed its very first EV, but it's not impressive at all.
